summary: The meeting discussed two upcoming projects: an AI-powered customer support chatbot to be deployed within four weeks and a cloud-based inventory management system for warehouse operation, with a target completion of six weeks. Both projects require the involvement of end, back end, and machine learning engineers.

tasks.task: Develop MVP version of AI chatbot
tasks.sentence: Develop an MVP version of an AI-powered customer support chatbot that integrates with the CRM system using natural language processing, with a deployment deadline within four weeks.

Develop a cloud-based inventory management system for warehouse operation that supports automated restocking alerts, barcode scanning, integration, and detailed analytics dashboards, with a target completion of six weeks.
